ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Newbie Bard needs hunting suggestions
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for all the replies folks (and keep em comin *grin* particularly any 10-20 suggestions in Kunark) I forgot about how much fun reavers are and how
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for all the replies folks (and keep 'em comin' *grin* particularly
any 10-20 suggestions in Kunark)

I forgot about how much fun reavers are and how effective the hermit is
(assuming you can get the camp) and how great NK is for teenagers.

There are some Right of Passage places I was forgetting too, like wisps in
Erud's crossing at 12.

Oooh, and the Kisch der Pavz....gotta give it a try once I get hit 19 and
get invis.


Thanks all!
Tszaaz


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
